DialogueItems.text: System initiate. Prototype 100 launch. Virtual sensors calibrated.
You are our fourth prototype, and we will test you for various skills to apply in the real world.
For the first stage, we will ask you to move around this virtual world to assess your level of body control.
We only hope that you will be a successful prototype, and not morph into a virus like your predecessors: prototypes /#001, 010, and 011#/.
That would be problematic, as they would eat out any system that they touch.
There is no need to worry though. Your system have been isolated and the viruses have been safely contained.
A /#floating marker#/ will guide you through the course.
If you can comprehend, code in /# Enter One-Zero-Zero #/
